service.title: Origin Cookies
service.documentation: This document updates RFC 6265, defining the "origin" attribute for cookies and the "Origin-Cookie" header field, which together allow servers to choose to harmonize the security policy of their cookies with the same-origin policy which governs other available client-side storage mechanisms.

http-header.documentation: The user agent includes stored cookies whose "origin-flag" is set in the "Origin-Cookie" request header. When the user agent generates an HTTP request, it MUST NOT attach more than one "Origin-Cookie" header field.
